title: Arlinski-Infinite Knowledge-Conscious Conception Wisdom(1983)
description:
This is L. Arlinski&#039;s mindblowing booklet Infinite Knowledge - Conscious Conception Wisdom (1983) that gives the reader hints on how to tap into the universal "Infinite Knowledge" or the library of the intuitive universe, already containing all possible knowledge - a technique seem to be knowingly or unknowingly used by many world&#039;s geniuses such as Nikola Tesla when he simply "conjured" the schematics for his amazing inventions. Among the methods described inside are Instant knowledge, Putting it on the wire, Stare - no think, Total think out, Qualifying, Sleep on it and Mindscape it. All are based on a simple fact that mind is always more powerful than matter or Mind over matter. The book also contains essays by Al Fry and various tidbits of strange information which may come helpful when making your own spiritual journeys. 32 pages, many pictures. A must read for everyone.

More info: http://www.honesty.org
